<h2 style="text-align:center;">Code</h2>

<hr style="width:50%;text-align:center;">

<br>

This website is developed using `R`. For the graphs, it uses [Plotly](https://plotly.com/r) through the `plotly` package. (It is also possible to replicate the plots using Plotly's Chart Studio.) For the tables, it uses the `gt` package.

You can browse the source code for this website and the plots [here](https://github.com/dzulfiqarfr/indonesia-recovery-tracker/).
